statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_data ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity < 10 AND price < 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory_data WHERE price <= 50.00 AND quantity >= 20 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY quantity, product_name
SELECT * FROM inventory_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM inventory_data WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, product_id, order_date FROM e_commerce WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 10
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM e_commerce JOIN inventory_data ON e_commerce.product_id = inventory_data.id
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_price > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_price > 1000 AND quantity < 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Order WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity, total_price FROM Inventory JOIN Order ON Inventory.product_id = Order.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT category_id FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories INNER JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.category_id GROUP BY category_name;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity >= 5;

SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.order_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
